claim: Flublok (quadrivalent) was evaluated in the pivotal trial against Fluarix (quadrivalent standard-dose vaccine).
explanation: Flowchart decision tree for pediatric influenza vaccination: asks if a child received two or more doses of trivalent or quadrivalent influenza vaccine before July 1, 2022; if yes, recommends one dose of 2022–23 influenza vaccine; if no or unknown, recommends two doses of 2022–23 influenza vaccine administered four weeks apart. does not support the claim: the figure presents a dosing algorithm for children's influenza vaccination and makes no reference to Flublok, Fluarix, or any pivotal trial comparison.

detailed_analysis.image_description: Flowchart decision tree for pediatric influenza vaccination: asks if a child received two or more doses of trivalent or quadrivalent influenza vaccine before July 1, 2022; if yes, recommends one dose of 2022–23 influenza vaccine; if no or unknown, recommends two doses of 2022–23 influenza vaccine administered four weeks apart.
detailed_analysis.reasoning: does not support the claim: the figure presents a dosing algorithm for children's influenza vaccination and makes no reference to Flublok, Fluarix, or any pivotal trial comparison.
